Question 39 
 
 
 
  
Communications System (2M)
A message signal having peak-to-peak value of 2 V, root mean square value of 0.1 V and bandwidth of 5 
kHz is sampled and fed to a pulse code modulation (PCM) system that uses a uniform quantizer. The PCM 
output is transmitted over a channel that can support a maximum transmission rate of 50 kbps. Assuming 
that the quantization error is uniformly distributed, the maximum signal to quantization noise ratio that 
can be obtained by the PCM system (rounded off to two decimal places) is ______.
